directions: Stir sugar and water in small saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Increase heat and bring to boil. Cool sugar syrup.
Transfer syrup to blender. Add ice, bananas, rum, and lime juice; blend until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.
Garnish rims of glasses with pineapple wedges and cherries, if desired.
ingredients: Optional garnishes: pineapple wedges, maraschino cherries
title: Banana Daiquiri
